segments.text: I'm really noticing the details of this overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is running steadily from the faucet, a continuous stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It forms a perfect sheet as it spills over the front edge of the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now it's cascading down the cabinet doors, leaving wet trails.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is definitely expanding, quite quickly, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the soft splash as it spreads further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the water damage that's going to happen to those wooden cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel quite disgusted to think of the mold and rot later on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This neglect is really quite frustrating to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation seems so avoidable, yet it's progressing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the floor isn't made of anything too porous, or it will warp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just an incredible waste of water, running unchecked like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is certainly creating a lot of tension within me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't felt the cold water seeping into her shoe yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
